name: Deadline (resub)
description:
Made for the Interstellar Game Jam in 5 days, with the theme "Time Control." The tutorial (among other things) is bugged in the current build, so the controls are here:

AD: move left and right

Space: jump

Left shift: slow time

Left ctrl: speed time

Slowing down the game can be useful for tight platforming, but it doesn't put a stop to the timer ticking down to your doom! Reach the end before your fuse runs out and you hit your deadline!

Water doesn't do anything at the moment, but if you make it to the water pool consider yourself a winner.

Programming: Tyler, Roiboi

Art: Roiboi, Tyler

Sound Effects (not yet implemented, though made within the jam period): Dgull, Sirpanda

Music: Melnight and Dgull (tutorial music)

Font is Orange Kid from Typodermic Fonts
